summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1896, for the improvement of West Sixtieth Street, in the City of Seattle, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Fourteenth Avenue Northwest, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 19564, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
